  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Contains properties used by `door.gd` for individual door setup, including `tooltip`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
---}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
## **3. Resource and Data Structures Documentation**}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
### **Custom Resources**}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
#### **`DoorData.gd`**}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Extends**: `Resource`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Class Name**: `DoorData`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Purpose**: Stores an array of door data dictionaries for building generation.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Structure**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **`doors`**: Exported array containing door data dictionaries.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
### **Data Field Definitions**}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
Each door in the `doors` array is a dictionary with the following fields:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **`index`** (`int`):}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Description**: Unique identifier for the door.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **`floor_number`** (`int`):}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Description**: Specifies the floor where the door is located.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **`door_slot`** (`int`):}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Description**: Determines the door's position on the floor.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **`door_type`** (`int`):}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Description**: Indicates the visual style or type of the door.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **`owner`** (`String`):}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Description**: Name of the owner or entity associated with the door.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **`tooltip`** (`String`):}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Description**: Additional information displayed when interacting with the door.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
### **Integration with Scripts**}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **`building.gd`**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Preloads `DoorData.gd` to access door configuration data.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Uses the `doors` array to instantiate and configure doors on each floor, including passing tooltip text.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **`door.gd`**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Receives individual `door_data` dictionaries during configuration.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Uses `door_data` fields to set door properties, animations, and tooltip text.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Adjusts tooltip display based on player interaction.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
---}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
## **4. Flow of Execution and Interaction**}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
### **Process Overview**}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
1. **Game Start**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
   }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- The **Main Scene** (`Node2D`) is loaded as the game's entry point.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
   }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Building Scene** (`Node2D`) is instantiated within the Main Scene.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
2. **Building Generation**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
   }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- `building.gd` script runs `_ready()` function.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
   }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Loads `DoorData.gd` and preloads floor scenes.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
   }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Calls `generate_building()` to start building creation.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
3. **Floor Instantiation**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
   }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Iterates through floor scenes in `FLOOR_SCENES`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
   }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- For each floor:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
     }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Instantiates floor using `instantiate_floor()`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
     }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Positions floor with `position_floor()`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
     }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Configures collision shapes and markers.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
4. **Door Placement**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
   }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Calls `add_doors_to_floor()` for each floor.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
   }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Filters doors for the current floor from `DoorData.gd`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
   }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- For each door:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
     }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Calculates position with `get_door_slot_position()`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
     }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Instantiates a **Door** node.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
     }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Configures the door using `configure_door()`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
5. **Door Configuration**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
   }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Each **Door** node runs the `door.gd` script.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
   }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- `configure(door_data)` applies specific settings to the door, including tooltip text.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
   }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Door animations, collision shapes, and tooltip sizes are updated accordingly.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
6. **Player Interaction**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
   }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- When the player moves the cursor over a door:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
     }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- The `mouse_entered` signal is emitted.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
     }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- `_on_mouse_entered()` function displays the tooltip.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
   }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- When the cursor leaves the door area:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
     }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- The `mouse_exited` signal is emitted.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
     }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- `_on_mouse_exited()` function hides the tooltip.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
7. **Completion**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
   }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- The building is fully generated with all floors and doors properly configured.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
   }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Tooltips enhance player interaction by providing additional information.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
### **Interaction Points**}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Doors**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Collision Detection**: Doors are `Area2D` nodes with `CollisionShape2D`, enabling interaction detection.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Tooltip Display**: Tooltips appear when the player's cursor hovers over a door.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **TooltipBackground** and **TooltipLabel** nodes manage the visual display.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Tooltip text is sourced from `DoorData.gd`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **State Management**: Doors can change states (open/closed) using `set_door_state()`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Animations**: Visual feedback provided through `AnimatedSprite2D`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Potential User Interactions**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Viewing Tooltips**: Players receive additional information about doors when hovering over them.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Opening/Closing Doors**: (Implementation pending) Players may interact with doors to change their state.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
---}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
## **5. Summary of Additions Made**}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
### **Integration of Tooltip Feature**}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Node Hierarchy Updates**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Added**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **TooltipBackground** (`NinePatchRect`): Serves as a scalable background for the tooltip.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **TooltipLabel** (`Label`): Displays the tooltip text.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Placement**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Both nodes are children of the **Door** node (`Area2D`), with `TooltipLabel` as a child of `TooltipBackground`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Script Enhancements in `door.gd`**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Variables Added**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- `tooltip_background`: References the `TooltipBackground` node.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- `tooltip_label`: References the `TooltipLabel` node.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Functions Added/Modified**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **`_ready()`**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
      }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Initialized tooltip nodes.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
      }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Connected `mouse_entered` and `mouse_exited` signals to handle tooltip display.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
      }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Called `_update_tooltip_size()` to adjust tooltip dimensions.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **`configure(door_data)`**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
      }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Sets the tooltip text from `door_data.tooltip`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
      }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Calls `_update_tooltip_size()` after setting the text.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **`_on_mouse_entered()` and `_on_mouse_exited()`**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
      }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Control the visibility of the tooltip based on player interaction.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **`_update_tooltip_size()`**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
      }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Calculates the size of the tooltip background to match the tooltip text.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
      }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Adjusts positions and sizes of `TooltipBackground` and `TooltipLabel`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Signal Connections**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Connected `mouse_entered` and `mouse_exited` signals to their respective handler functions.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Data Structure Updates in `DoorData.gd`**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Field**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **`tooltip`** (`String`): Added to door data dictionaries to provide tooltip text.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Usage**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Each door's `tooltip` field is accessed by `door.gd` to display the appropriate text.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Flow of Execution Adjustments**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **During Door Configuration**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Tooltip text is now set when doors are configured.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Tooltip size adjustments ensure that the background scales with the text.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Player Interaction**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Added handling for displaying and hiding tooltips based on mouse hover events.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **User Experience Enhancements**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Visual Feedback**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Tooltips provide immediate information about doors, such as owner names or descriptions.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Enhances immersion and provides context within the game world.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Additional Code Improvements**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Enumerations**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Used `enum DoorState` for better code readability and state management.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Type Annotations**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Added type annotations for variables and function returns to improve code clarity.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
  }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- **Deferred Calls**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af8\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4
    }{\hich\af4\loch\fs22\lang1031\f4\loch
- Used `call_deferred("_update_tooltip_size")` to ensure the tooltip size updates after the text change.}
\par }
