  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Uses data from `DoorData.gd` to configure doors, including passing tooltip text.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **`door.gd`**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Attached to **Door** nodes (`Area2D`).}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Relies on child nodes:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
    }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **AnimatedSprite2D** for door animations.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
    }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **CollisionShape2D** for interaction detection.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
    }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **TooltipBackground** (`NinePatchRect`) with `tooltip.gd` attached.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Uses `door_data` to configure door appearance and behavior.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Interacts with `tooltip.gd` to display tooltips.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **`tooltip.gd`**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Attached to **TooltipBackground** nodes (`NinePatchRect`).}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Manages tooltip text display and sizing.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Interacts with `door.gd` via exposed methods (`set_text`, `show_tooltip`, `hide_tooltip`).}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **`DoorData.gd`**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Provides door configuration data to `building.gd`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Contains properties used by `door.gd` and `tooltip.gd` for individual door setup, including `tooltip`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
---}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
## **3. Resource and Data Structures Documentation**}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
### **Custom Resources**}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
#### **`DoorData.gd`**}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Extends**: `Resource`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Class Name**: `DoorData`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Purpose**: Stores an array of door data dictionaries for building generation.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Structure**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **`doors`**: Exported array containing door data dictionaries.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
### **Data Field Definitions**}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
Each door in the `doors` array is a dictionary with the following fields:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **`index`** (`int`):}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Description**: Unique identifier for the door.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **`floor_number`** (`int`):}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Description**: Specifies the floor where the door is located.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **`door_slot`** (`int`):}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Description**: Determines the door's position on the floor.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **`door_type`** (`int`):}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Description**: Indicates the visual style or type of the door.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **`owner`** (`String`):}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Description**: Name of the owner or entity associated with the door.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **`tooltip`** (`String`):}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Description**: Additional information displayed when interacting with the door.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
### **Integration with Scripts**}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **`building.gd`**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Preloads `DoorData.gd` to access door configuration data.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Uses the `doors` array to instantiate and configure doors on each floor, including passing tooltip text.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **`door.gd`**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Receives individual `door_data` dictionaries during configuration.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Uses `door_data` fields to set door properties and passes tooltip text to `tooltip.gd`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **`tooltip.gd`**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Receives tooltip text from `door.gd` via the `set_text` method.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Manages display and sizing of the tooltip based on the text provided.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
---}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
## **4. Flow of Execution and Interaction**}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
### **Process Overview**}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
1. **Game Start**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
   }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- The **Main Scene** (`Node2D`) is loaded as the game's entry point.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
   }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Building Scene** (`Node2D`) is instantiated within the Main Scene.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
2. **Building Generation**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
   }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- `building.gd` script runs `_ready()` function.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
   }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Loads `DoorData.gd` and preloads floor scenes.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
   }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Calls `generate_building()` to start building creation.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
3. **Floor Instantiation**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
   }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Iterates through floor scenes in `FLOOR_SCENES`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
   }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- For each floor:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
     }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Instantiates floor using `instantiate_floor()`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
     }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Positions floor with `position_floor()`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
     }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Configures collision shapes and markers.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
4. **Door Placement**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
   }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Calls `add_doors_to_floor()` for each floor.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
   }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Filters doors for the current floor from `DoorData.gd`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
   }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- For each door:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
     }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Calculates position with `get_door_slot_position()`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
     }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Instantiates a **Door** node.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
     }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Configures the door using `configure_door()`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
5. **Door Configuration**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
   }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Each **Door** node runs the `door.gd` script.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
   }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- `configure(door_data)` applies specific settings to the door, including door type.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
   }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Passes tooltip text to `tooltip_background.set_text(door_data.tooltip)`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
   }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Door animations and collision shapes are updated accordingly.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
6. **Tooltip Setup**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
   }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- The `tooltip.gd` script attached to `TooltipBackground` initializes and sets the tooltip text.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
   }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Adjusts the tooltip size and position based on the text content.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
7. **Player Interaction**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
   }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- When the player moves the cursor over a door:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
     }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- The `mouse_entered` signal is emitted.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
     }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- `door.gd` calls `tooltip_background.show_tooltip()` to display the tooltip.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
   }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- When the cursor leaves the door area:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
     }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- The `mouse_exited` signal is emitted.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
     }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- `door.gd` calls `tooltip_background.hide_tooltip()` to hide the tooltip.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
8. **Completion**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
   }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- The building is fully generated with all floors and doors properly configured.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
   }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Tooltips enhance player interaction by providing additional information.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
### **Interaction Points**}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Doors**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Collision Detection**: Doors are `Area2D` nodes with `CollisionShape2D`, enabling interaction detection.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Tooltip Display**: Tooltips appear when the player's cursor hovers over a door.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
    }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **TooltipBackground** (`NinePatchRect`) with `tooltip.gd` attached manages the visual display.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
    }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Tooltip text is sourced from `DoorData.gd` and passed through `door.gd` to `tooltip.gd`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **State Management**: Doors can change states (open/closed) using `set_door_state()`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Animations**: Visual feedback provided through `AnimatedSprite2D`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Potential User Interactions**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Viewing Tooltips**: Players receive additional information about doors when hovering over them.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Opening/Closing Doors**: (Implementation pending) Players may interact with doors to change their state.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
---}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
## **5. Summary of Changes**}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
### **Encapsulation of Tooltip Functionality**}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Creation of `tooltip.gd` Script**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Purpose**: Manages tooltip display and sizing, separating it from the door logic.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Attached to**: `TooltipBackground` node (`NinePatchRect`).}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Responsibilities**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
    }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Handles all aspects of tooltip display, including setting text, showing, hiding, and resizing.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
    }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Provides methods `set_text()`, `show_tooltip()`, and `hide_tooltip()` for interaction.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Updates to `door.gd` Script**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Removed** tooltip handling code that was previously part of `door.gd`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Interacts with `tooltip.gd`**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
    }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Calls `tooltip_background.set_text(door_data.tooltip)` to set the tooltip text during configuration.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
    }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Uses `tooltip_background.show_tooltip()` and `tooltip_background.hide_tooltip()` in mouse event handlers.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Simplified Responsibilities**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
    }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Focuses on door-specific logic such as state management, animation, and collision shape updates.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Node Hierarchy Changes**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **TooltipBackground** (`NinePatchRect`) now has `tooltip.gd` attached to it.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- The structure under each `Door` node is updated to reflect this change.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Flow of Execution Adjustments**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **During Door Configuration**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
    }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Tooltip text is set via `tooltip.gd`, which handles sizing and positioning internally.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
  }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- **Player Interaction**:}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5
    }{\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch
- Tooltip display is managed by `tooltip.gd` in response to calls from `door.gd`.}
\par \pard\plain \s0\rtlch\af7\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\ql\sb0\sa200\ltrpar\hich\af5\loch\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par }

================
File: docs/doc5.rtf

\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl4\ls1 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li3545\lin3545\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

Brief Descriptions}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Purpose}{\loch
: Serves as the root of the game and the entry point when the game starts. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Contains}{\loch
: The }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Building Scene}{\loch
 and possibly other UI or game elements. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Purpose}{\loch
: Manages the generation and configuration of the building's floors. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Script}{\loch
: Attached script }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 (extends }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Node2D}{\loch
). }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Functionality}{\loch
: Preloads floor scenes and door data, generates the building structure, and passes door data to floor instances for door instantiation. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Floor Scenes}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Description}{\loch
: A collection of floor instances (}{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
floor_0}{\loch
, }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
floor_1}{\loch
, etc.) dynamically instantiated during runtime by }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

Area2D}{\loch
):}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Purpose}{\loch
: Represents an individual floor within the building. }

Contains}{\loch
: }

\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s3\rtlch\af11\afs28\ab \ltrch\hich\af3\loch\ilvl2\outlinelevel2\sb140\sa120\keepn\f3\fs28\b\dbch\af9\ql\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
Explicit Relationships}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Main Scene}{\loch
 includes }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Building Scene}{\loch
 as a child node. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Building Scene}{\loch
 uses the }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 script to manage building generation. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 extends }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Node2D}{\loch
 and is attached to }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Building Scene}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 instantiates }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Floor Scenes}{\loch
 during runtime. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Floor_X}{\loch
 instances receive door data from }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 and handle door instantiation themselves. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Door}{\loch
 nodes are managed by the }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 script, which extends }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Area2D}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 relies on its child nodes: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
AnimatedSprite2D}{\loch
 for displaying door animations. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
CollisionShape2D}{\loch
 for interaction detection. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
TooltipBackground}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
NinePatchRect}{\loch
) with }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
 attached, which manages tooltip display. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
 is attached to }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
TooltipBackground}{\loch
 and handles all tooltip functionality. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
DoorData.gd}{\loch
 provides configuration data used by }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 to provide door data to floors, and by }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 to configure individual doors. }
\par \pard\plain \s25\rtlch\afs12 \ltrch\loch\sb0\sa283\brdrt\brdrnone\brdrl\brdrnone\brdrb\brdrdb\brdrw1\brdrcf15\brsp0\brdrr\brdrnone\noline\fs12\ql\ltrpar\loch

\par \pard\plain \s2\rtlch\af11\afs36\ab \ltrch\hich\af3\loch\ilvl1\outlinelevel1\sb200\sa120\keepn\f3\fs36\b\dbch\af9\ql\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
2. Script Summaries and Responsibilities}
\par \pard\plain \s3\rtlch\af11\afs28\ab \ltrch\hich\af3\loch\ilvl2\outlinelevel2\sb140\sa120\keepn\f3\fs28\b\dbch\af9\ql\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
High-Level Overviews}
\par \pard\plain \s4\rtlch\af11\afs24\ab \ltrch\hich\af3\loch\ilvl3\outlinelevel3\sb120\sa120\keepn\f3\fs24\b\dbch\af9\ql\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls4 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Extends}{\loch
: }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Node2D}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls4 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

: }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Building Scene}{\loch

\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls4 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Purpose}{\loch
: Manages the procedural generation of the building. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls4 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Responsibilities}{\loch
: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls4 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Preloads floor scenes and door data (}{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
DoorData.gd}{\loch
). }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls4 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Instantiates and positions floors within the building. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls4 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Configures collision shapes and markers for floors. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls4 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\ltrpar{\loch
Provides relevant door data to floor instances for door instantiation. }
\par \pard\plain \s4\rtlch\af11\afs24\ab \ltrch\hich\af3\loch\ilvl3\outlinelevel3\sb120\sa120\keepn\f3\fs24\b\dbch\af9\ql\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls5 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Extends}{\loch
: }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Area2D}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls5 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

: }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Door}{\loch
 nodes. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls5 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Purpose}{\loch
: Controls the behavior, appearance, positioning, and interaction of individual doors. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls5 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Responsibilities}{\loch
: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls5 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Configures doors based on provided }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door_data}{\loch
, including door type. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls5 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Calculates and sets its own position on the floor. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls5 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Manages door states (open or closed). }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls5 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Updates door animations accordingly. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls5 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Sets up collision shapes for interaction detection. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls5 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\ltrpar{\loch
Interacts with }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
 to handle tooltip display when the player interacts with the door. }
\par \pard\plain \s4\rtlch\af11\afs24\ab \ltrch\hich\af3\loch\ilvl3\outlinelevel3\sb120\sa120\keepn\f3\fs24\b\dbch\af9\ql\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip.gd}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls6 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Extends}{\loch
: }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
NinePatchRect}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls6 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Attached to}{\loch
: }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
TooltipBackground}{\loch

\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls6 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Purpose}{\loch
: Manages tooltip display and sizing. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls6 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Responsibilities}{\loch
: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls6 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Handles all aspects of tooltip display, including setting text, showing, hiding, and resizing. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls6 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Adjusts tooltip background size to fit the tooltip text. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls6 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\ltrpar{\loch
Positions the tooltip appropriately relative to the door. }
\par \pard\plain \s4\rtlch\af11\afs24\ab \ltrch\hich\af3\loch\ilvl3\outlinelevel3\sb120\sa120\keepn\f3\fs24\b\dbch\af9\ql\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
DoorData.gd}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls7 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Extends}{\loch
: }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Resource}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls7 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

: }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
DoorData}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls7 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Purpose}{\loch
: Provides door configuration data for the building generation process. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls7 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Structure}{\loch
: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls7 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\ltrpar{\loch
Contains an exported array }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
doors}{\loch
, which holds dictionaries with door properties, including tooltip text. }
\par \pard\plain \s3\rtlch\af11\afs28\ab \ltrch\hich\af3\loch\ilvl2\outlinelevel2\sb140\sa120\keepn\f3\fs28\b\dbch\af9\ql\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
Function Descriptions}
\par \pard\plain \s4\rtlch\af11\afs24\ab \ltrch\hich\af3\loch\ilvl3\outlinelevel3\sb120\sa120\keepn\f3\fs24\b\dbch\af9\ql\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls8 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
_ready()}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls8 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Description}{\loch
: Initializes the building generation process when the }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Building Scene}{\loch
 is ready. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls8 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Actions}{\loch
: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls8 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Calls }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
generate_building()}{\loch
 to start building generation. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls8 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
generate_building()}{\loch
:}

Description}{\loch
