tooltip.gd}{\loch
 to display tooltips. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls11 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls11 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Attached to }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
TooltipBackground}{\loch
 nodes (}{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
NinePatchRect}{\loch
). }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls11 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Manages tooltip text display and sizing. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls11 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Interacts with }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 via exposed methods (}{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
set_text}{\loch
, }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
show_tooltip}{\loch
, }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
hide_tooltip}{\loch
). }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls11 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
DoorData.gd}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls11 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Provides door configuration data to }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls11 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\ltrpar{\loch
Contains properties used by }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 and }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
 for individual door setup, including }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s25\rtlch\afs12 \ltrch\loch\sb0\sa283\brdrt\brdrnone\brdrl\brdrnone\brdrb\brdrdb\brdrw1\brdrcf15\brsp0\brdrr\brdrnone\noline\fs12\ql\ltrpar\loch

\par \pard\plain \s2\rtlch\af11\afs36\ab \ltrch\hich\af3\loch\ilvl1\outlinelevel1\sb200\sa120\keepn\f3\fs36\b\dbch\af9\ql\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
3. Resource and Data Structures Documentation}
\par \pard\plain \s3\rtlch\af11\afs28\ab \ltrch\hich\af3\loch\ilvl2\outlinelevel2\sb140\sa120\keepn\f3\fs28\b\dbch\af9\ql\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
Custom Resources}
\par \pard\plain \s4\rtlch\af11\afs24\ab \ltrch\hich\af3\loch\ilvl3\outlinelevel3\sb120\sa120\keepn\f3\fs24\b\dbch\af9\ql\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
DoorData.gd}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Extends}{\loch
: }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Resource}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Class Name}{\loch
: }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
DoorData}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Purpose}{\loch
: Stores an array of door data dictionaries for building generation. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Structure}{\loch
: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
doors}{\loch
: Exported array containing door data dictionaries. }
\par \pard\plain \s3\rtlch\af11\afs28\ab \ltrch\hich\af3\loch\ilvl2\outlinelevel2\sb140\sa120\keepn\f3\fs28\b\dbch\af9\ql\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
Data Field Definitions}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140\ql\ltrpar{\loch
Each door in the }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
doors}{\loch
 array is a dictionary with the following fields:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls13 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
index}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
int}{\loch
):}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls13 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Description}{\loch
: Unique identifier for the door. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls13 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
floor_number}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
int}{\loch
):}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls13 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Description}{\loch
: Specifies the floor where the door is located. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls13 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door_slot}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
int}{\loch
):}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls13 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Description}{\loch
: Determines the door's position on the floor. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls13 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door_type}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
int}{\loch
):}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls13 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Description}{\loch
: Indicates the visual style or type of the door. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls13 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
owner}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
String}{\loch
):}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls13 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Description}{\loch
: Name of the owner or entity associated with the door. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls13 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
String}{\loch
):}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls13 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Description}{\loch
: Additional information displayed when interacting with the door. }
\par \pard\plain \s3\rtlch\af11\afs28\ab \ltrch\hich\af3\loch\ilvl2\outlinelevel2\sb140\sa120\keepn\f3\fs28\b\dbch\af9\ql\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
Integration with Scripts}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Preloads }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
DoorData.gd}{\loch
 to access door configuration data. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Filters door data for each floor and provides it to floor instances. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Receives individual }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door_data}{\loch
 dictionaries during setup. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Uses }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door_data}{\loch
 fields to set door properties and passes tooltip text to }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Calculates its position on the floor based on }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door_data.door_slot}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Receives tooltip text from }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 via the }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
set_text}{\loch
 method. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\ltrpar{\loch
Manages display and sizing of the tooltip based on the text provided. }
\par \pard\plain \s25\rtlch\afs12 \ltrch\loch\sb0\sa283\brdrt\brdrnone\brdrl\brdrnone\brdrb\brdrdb\brdrw1\brdrcf15\brsp0\brdrr\brdrnone\noline\fs12\ql\ltrpar\loch

\par \pard\plain \s2\rtlch\af11\afs36\ab \ltrch\hich\af3\loch\ilvl1\outlinelevel1\sb200\sa120\keepn\f3\fs36\b\dbch\af9\ql\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
4. Flow of Execution and Interaction}
\par \pard\plain \s3\rtlch\af11\afs28\ab \ltrch\hich\af3\loch\ilvl2\outlinelevel2\sb140\sa120\keepn\f3\fs28\b\dbch\af9\ql\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
Process Overview}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain  1.\tab}\ilvl0\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Game Start}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
The }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Main Scene}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Node2D}{\loch
) is loaded as the game's entry point. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Building Scene}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Node2D}{\loch
) is instantiated within the Main Scene. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain  2.\tab}\ilvl0\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Building Generation}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 script runs }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
_ready()}{\loch
 function. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Preloads }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
DoorData.gd}{\loch
 and floor scenes. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Calls }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
generate_building()}{\loch
 to start building creation. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain  3.\tab}\ilvl0\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Floor Instantiation}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Iterates through floor scenes in }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
FLOOR_SCENES}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
For each floor: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Instantiates floor using }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
instantiate_floor()}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Positions floor with }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
position_floor()}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Configures collision shapes and markers. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Filters door data for the current floor. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Passes relevant door data to the floor instance. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain  4.\tab}\ilvl0\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Door Placement by Floor Instances}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Each }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Floor_X}{\loch
 instance receives door data. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
For each door data: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Instantiates a }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Door}{\loch
 node. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Calls }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
setup()}{\loch
 on the }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Door}{\loch
 node, passing }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door_data}{\loch
 and }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
floor_instance}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain  5.\tab}\ilvl0\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Door Configuration}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Each }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Door}{\loch
 node runs the }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 script. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
setup(p_door_data, p_floor_instance)}{\loch
 applies specific settings to the door, including door type. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Calculates and sets its own position on the floor using }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
position_door()}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Passes tooltip text to }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip_background.set_text(door_data.tooltip)}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Door animations and collision shapes are updated accordingly. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain  6.\tab}\ilvl0\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Tooltip Setup}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
The }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
 script attached to }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
TooltipBackground}{\loch
 initializes and sets the tooltip text. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Adjusts the tooltip size and position based on the text content. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain  7.\tab}\ilvl0\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Player Interaction}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
When the player moves the cursor over a door: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
The }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
mouse_entered}{\loch
 signal is emitted. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 calls }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip_background.show_tooltip()}{\loch
 to display the tooltip. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
When the cursor leaves the door area: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
The }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
mouse_exited}{\loch
 signal is emitted. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 calls }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip_background.hide_tooltip()}{\loch
 to hide the tooltip. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain  8.\tab}\ilvl0\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Completion}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
The building is fully generated with all floors and doors properly configured. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\ltrpar{\loch
Tooltips enhance player interaction by providing additional information. }
\par \pard\plain \s3\rtlch\af11\afs28\ab \ltrch\hich\af3\loch\ilvl2\outlinelevel2\sb140\sa120\keepn\f3\fs28\b\dbch\af9\ql\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
Interaction Points}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Doors}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Collision Detection}{\loch
: Doors are }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Area2D}{\loch
 nodes with }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
CollisionShape2D}{\loch
, enabling interaction detection. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Tooltip Display}{\loch
: Tooltips appear when the player's cursor hovers over a door. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
TooltipBackground}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
NinePatchRect}{\loch
) with }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
 attached manages the visual display. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Tooltip text is sourced from }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
DoorData.gd}{\loch
 and passed through }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 to }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
State Management}{\loch
: Doors can change states (open/closed) using }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
set_door_state()}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Animations}{\loch
: Visual feedback provided through }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
AnimatedSprite2D}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Potential User Interactions}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Viewing Tooltips}{\loch
: Players receive additional information about doors when hovering over them. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Opening/Closing Doors}{\loch
: (Implementation pending) Players may interact with doors to change their state. }
\par \pard\plain \s25\rtlch\afs12 \ltrch\loch\sb0\sa283\brdrt\brdrnone\brdrl\brdrnone\brdrb\brdrdb\brdrw1\brdrcf15\brsp0\brdrr\brdrnone\noline\fs12\ql\ltrpar\loch

\par \pard\plain \s2\rtlch\af11\afs36\ab \ltrch\hich\af3\loch\ilvl1\outlinelevel1\sb200\sa120\keepn\f3\fs36\b\dbch\af9\ql\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
5. Summary of Changes}
\par \pard\plain \s3\rtlch\af11\afs28\ab \ltrch\hich\af3\loch\ilvl2\outlinelevel2\sb140\sa120\keepn\f3\fs28\b\dbch\af9\ql\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
Refactoring Door Instantiation and Configuration}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Changes to }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
 Script}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Removed Door-Related Methods}{\loch
: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
add_doors_to_floor()}{\loch
, }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
configure_door()}{\loch
, }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
get_door_slot_position()}{\loch
, }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
get_door_dimensions()}{\loch
, and }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
get_door_height_offset()}{\loch
 have been removed from }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Simplified Responsibilities}{\loch
: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 now focuses on instantiating and positioning floors. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Provides relevant door data to floor instances for door instantiation. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Enhancements to }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
 Script}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Added }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
setup()}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
 Method}{\loch
: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Receives }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door_data}{\loch
 and }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
floor_instance}{\loch
 as parameters. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Handles door configuration, including setting door type and tooltip text. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Calculates and sets its own position on the floor. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Moved Position Calculation Logic}{\loch
: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Door position calculation is now handled within }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 via }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
position_door()}{\loch
 and }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
get_door_slot_position()}{\loch
 methods. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Fixed Variable Shadowing Warnings}{\loch
: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Renamed function parameters and local variables to avoid conflicts with class member variables and base class properties. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Flow of Execution Adjustments}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
During Floor Generation}{\loch
: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Door data is passed to floor instances, which handle door instantiation. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
During Door Setup}{\loch
: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Doors configure themselves based on }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door_data}{\loch
, including calculating their position. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\ltrpar{\loch
Tooltip text is set via }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
, which handles sizing and positioning internally. }
\par \pard\plain \s3\rtlch\af11\afs28\ab \ltrch\hich\af3\loch\ilvl2\outlinelevel2\sb140\sa120\keepn\f3\fs28\b\dbch\af9\ql\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
Benefits of the Refactoring}
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Simplification of }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
By delegating door creation to floors and doors, }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 focuses solely on building structure. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Encapsulation}{\loch
: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Each door handles its own configuration and positioning, making the code more modular. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Reusability}{\loch
: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Doors become self-contained units that can be reused elsewhere. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Maintainability}{\loch
: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch
Changes to door behavior only need to be made in }{\loch\cs17\rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0\ltrpar{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Avoidance of Variable Shadowing}{\loch
: }
\par \pard\plain \s21\loch\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa140{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af5 \ltrch\hich\af5\loch\f5\dbch\af5 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\ql\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\ltrpar{\loch
Warnings due to variable shadowing have been resolved, leading to cleaner code. }
\par \pard\plain \s25\rtlch\afs12 \ltrch\loch\sb0\sa283\brdrt\brdrnone\brdrl\brdrnone\brdrb\brdrdb\brdrw1\brdrcf15\brsp0\brdrr\brdrnone\noline\fs12\ql\sb0\sa283\ltrpar\hich\af7\loch\fs22\lang1031\f7\loch

\par }

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Purpose:}{\loch
 Serves as the root of the game and the entry point when the game starts. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Purpose:}{\loch
 Manages the generation and configuration of the building's floors. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

building.gd}{\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Functionality:}{\loch
 }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Preloads a single floor scene (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Floor.tscn}{\loch
) and door data (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Generates the building structure by instantiating multiple floor instances. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Configures collision shapes and markers for floors. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Provides door data to floor instances for door instantiation. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Floor Scene}{\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Description:}{\loch
 A single floor scene (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Floor.tscn}{\loch
) dynamically instantiated multiple times during runtime by }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Floor}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Area2D}{\loch
):}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Purpose:}{\loch
 Represents an individual floor within the building. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

floor.gd}{\loch
 (extends }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch

). }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Contains:}{\loch
 }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

 (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch

): Displays the visual representation of the floor. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

 (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
RectangleShape2D}{\loch
): Defines the collision area for physics interactions on the floor. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Marker2D}{\loch
: Serves as a reference point for positioning doors and other elements on the floor. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Doors}{\loch
: Instantiated at runtime by }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
floor.gd}{\loch
 using data from }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
DoorData.gd}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Door}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Purpose:}{\loch
 Represents an individual door on a floor. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s4\rtlch\af11\afs28\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af5\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb120\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf0\f5\fs28\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
Explicit Relationships}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Main Scene}{\loch
 includes }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Building Scene}{\loch
 as a child node. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Building Scene}{\loch
 uses the }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 script to manage building generation. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 extends }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Node2D}{\loch
 and is attached to }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Building Scene}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 instantiates multiple floor instances at runtime using the single }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Floor Scene}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Floor.tscn}{\loch
). }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Floor}{\loch
 instances receive door data from }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 and handle door instantiation themselves. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Door}{\loch
 nodes are managed by the }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 script, which extends }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Area2D}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 relies on its child nodes: }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
AnimatedSprite2D}{\loch
 for displaying door animations. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
CollisionShape2D}{\loch
 for interaction detection. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
TooltipBackground}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
NinePatchRect}{\loch
) with }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
 attached, which manages tooltip display. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
 is attached to }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
TooltipBackground}{\loch
 and handles all tooltip functionality. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
DoorData.gd}{\loch
 provides configuration data used by }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 to provide door data to floors, and by }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 to configure individual doors. }
\par \pard\plain \s196\rtlch\af11\afs12\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa283\brdrt\brdrnone\brdrl\brdrnone\brdrb\brdrdb\brdrw2\brdrcf15\brsp0\brdrr\brdrnone\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs12\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052\loch

\par \pard\plain \s3\rtlch\af11\afs28\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af5\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb140\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf0\f5\fs28\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
2. Script Summaries and Responsibilities}
\par \pard\plain \s4\rtlch\af11\afs28\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af5\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb120\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf0\f5\fs28\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
High-Level Overviews}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls4 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Extends:}{\loch
 }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls4 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

 }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

 node. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls4 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls8 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Purpose:}{\loch
 Provides door configuration data for the building generation process. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls8 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Structure:}{\loch
 }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls8 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418{\loch
Contains an exported array }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
doors}{\loch
, which holds dictionaries with door properties, including tooltip text. }
\par \pard\plain \s4\rtlch\af11\afs28\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af5\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb120\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf0\f5\fs28\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
Function Descriptions}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
_ready()}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Description:}{\loch
 Initializes the building generation process when the }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Building Scene}{\loch
 is ready. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Actions:}{\loch
 }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Calls }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
generate_building()}{\loch
 to start building generation. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
generate_building()}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Description:}{\loch
 Generates the building structure by instantiating floor instances. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Actions:}{\loch
 }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Iterates through floor numbers (e.g., 0 to 13). }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Instantiates each floor using }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
instantiate_floor(floor_number)}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Positions floors with }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
position_floor()}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Configures collision shapes and markers. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Filters door data for each floor and passes it to the floor instance. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
instantiate_floor(floor_number)}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Description:}{\loch
 Instantiates a floor instance and sets its properties. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Actions:}{\loch
 }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Instantiates the floor scene (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Floor.tscn}{\loch
). }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Sets }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
floor_number}{\loch
 and }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
floor_image_path}{\loch
 on the floor instance. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Adds the floor instance to the scene tree. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
position_floor(floor_instance, previous_floor_top_y_position, is_first_floor)}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Description:}{\loch
 Positions the floor instance within the building. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Actions:}{\loch
 }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Calculates the position based on the floor's height and stacking order. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Returns the new }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
previous_floor_top_y_position}{\loch
 for stacking subsequent floors. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
configure_collision_shape(floor_instance)}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Description:}{\loch
 Configures the collision shape for the floor. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Actions:}{\loch
 }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Adjusts the collision shape's size and position based on the floor sprite. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
configure_marker(floor_instance)}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Description:}{\loch
 Configures the marker used for positioning doors. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Actions:}{\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls9 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127{\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Floor instances handle door instantiation and pass }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door_data}{\loch
 to door nodes. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
floor.gd}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls13 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls13 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls13 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
