\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls13 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
doors}{\loch
: Exported array containing door data dictionaries. }
\par \pard\plain \s4\rtlch\af11\afs28\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af5\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb120\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf0\f5\fs28\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
Data Field Definitions}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\loch
Each door in the }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
doors}{\loch
 array is a dictionary with the following fields:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
index}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
int}{\loch
):}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Description:}{\loch
 Unique identifier for the door. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
floor_number}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch

):}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Description:}{\loch
 Specifies the floor where the door is located. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch

 (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Description:}{\loch
 Determines the door's position on the floor. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls14 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Preloads }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
DoorData.gd}{\loch
 to access door configuration data. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Filters door data for each floor and provides it to floor instances. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
floor.gd}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Receives door data from }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Instantiates doors and passes }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door_data}{\loch
 to each door instance. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Receives individual }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door_data}{\loch
 dictionaries during setup. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Uses }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door_data}{\loch
 fields to set door properties and passes tooltip text to }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Calculates its position on the floor based on }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door_data.door_slot}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Receives tooltip text from }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 via the }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
set_text}{\loch
 method. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls15 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418{\loch
Manages display and sizing of the tooltip based on the text provided. }
\par \pard\plain \s196\rtlch\af11\afs12\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa283\brdrt\brdrnone\brdrl\brdrnone\brdrb\brdrdb\brdrw2\brdrcf15\brsp0\brdrr\brdrnone\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs12\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052\loch

\par \pard\plain \s3\rtlch\af11\afs28\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af5\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb140\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf0\f5\fs28\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
4. Flow of Execution and Interaction}
\par \pard\plain \s4\rtlch\af11\afs28\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af5\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb120\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf0\f5\fs28\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
Process Overview}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain  1.\tab}\ilvl0\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Game Start:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
The }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Main Scene}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Node2D}{\loch
) is loaded as the game's entry point. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Building Scene}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Node2D}{\loch
) is instantiated within the }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Main Scene}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain  2.\tab}\ilvl0\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Building Generation:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 script runs }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
_ready()}{\loch
 function. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Preloads }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
DoorData.gd}{\loch
 and the floor scene (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Floor.tscn}{\loch
). }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Calls }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain  3.\tab}\ilvl0\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Floor Instantiation:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Iterates through floor numbers (e.g., 0 to 13). }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
For each floor: }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Instantiates the floor using }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
instantiate_floor(floor_number)}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Sets }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
floor_number}{\loch
 and }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
floor_image_path}{\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Positions the floor with }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
position_floor()}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Configures collision shapes and markers. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Filters door data for the current floor. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain  4.\tab}\ilvl0\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Door Placement by Floor Instances:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Each floor instance receives door data. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch

Instantiates a door node. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch

 on the door node, passing }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch

\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain  5.\tab}\ilvl0\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Door Configuration:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch

door.gd}{\loch
 script. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch

 applies specific settings to the door, including door type. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Calculates and sets its own position on the floor using }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
position_door()}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Passes tooltip text to }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip_background.set_text(door_data.tooltip)}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Door animations and collision shapes are updated accordingly. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain  6.\tab}\ilvl0\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Tooltip Setup:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch

tooltip.gd}{\loch
 script attached to }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

 initializes and sets the tooltip text. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Adjusts the tooltip size and position based on the text content. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain  7.\tab}\ilvl0\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Player Interaction:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
When the player moves the cursor over a door: }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
The }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
mouse_entered}{\loch
 signal is emitted. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 calls }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip_background.show_tooltip()}{\loch
 to display the tooltip. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
When the cursor leaves the door area: }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch

mouse_exited}{\loch
 signal is emitted. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 calls }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip_background.hide_tooltip()}{\loch
 to hide the tooltip. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain  8.\tab}\ilvl0\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Completion:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
The building is fully generated with all floors and doors properly configured. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls16 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418{\loch
Tooltips enhance player interaction by providing additional information. }
\par \pard\plain \s4\rtlch\af11\afs28\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af5\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb120\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf0\f5\fs28\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
Interaction Points}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Doors:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Collision Detection:}{\loch
 Doors are }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
Area2D}{\loch
 nodes with }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
CollisionShape2D}{\loch
, enabling interaction detection. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Tooltip Display:}{\loch
 Tooltips appear when the player's cursor hovers over a door. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
TooltipBackground}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
NinePatchRect}{\loch
) with }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
 attached manages the visual display. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Tooltip text is sourced from }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
DoorData.gd}{\loch
 and passed through }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 to }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
State Management:}{\loch
 Doors can change states (open/closed) using }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
set_door_state()}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Animations:}{\loch
 Visual feedback provided through }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af10 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af8\loch
AnimatedSprite2D}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Potential User Interactions:}
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Viewing Tooltips:}{\loch
 Players receive additional information about doors when hovering over them. }
\par \pard\plain \s192\rtlch\af11\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\sl276\slmult1\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af7 \ltrch\hich\af7\loch\f7\dbch\af7 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Opening/Closing Doors:}{\loch
 (Implementation pending) Players may interact with doors to change their state. }
\par \pard\plain \s196\rtlch\af11\afs12\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa283\brdrt\brdrnone\brdrl\brdrnone\brdrb\brdrdb\brdrw2\brdrcf15\brsp0\brdrr\brdrnone\ltrpar\cf0\f3\fs12\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af8\langfe2052\loch

\par \pard\plain \s3\rtlch\af11\afs28\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af5\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb140\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf0\f5\fs28\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af9\langfe2052\sb140\sa120\hich\af6\loch\fs22\lang1031\f6\loch

Brief Descriptions}
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Main Scene (Node2D):}
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Purpose:}{\loch
 Serves as the root of the game and the entry point when the game starts. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Contains:}{\loch
 The Building Scene and possibly other UI or game elements. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Building Scene (Node2D):}
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Purpose:}{\loch
 Manages the generation of the building's floors. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Script:}{\loch
 Attached script }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 (extends Node2D). }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Functionality:}{\loch
 }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Preloads a single floor scene (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
Floor.tscn}{\loch
) and door data (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
DoorData.gd}{\loch
). }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Generates the building structure by instantiating multiple floor instances. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Provides door data to floor instances for door instantiation. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Floor Scene:}
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Description:}{\loch
 A single floor scene (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
Floor.tscn}{\loch
) dynamically instantiated multiple times during runtime by }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
building.gd}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Floor (Area2D):}
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Purpose:}{\loch
 Represents and configures individual floor instances. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Script:}{\loch
 Attached script }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
floor.gd}{\loch
 (extends Area2D). }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Contains:}{\loch
 }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
FloorSprite (Sprite2D):}{\loch
 Displays the visual representation of the floor. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
CollisionShape2D (RectangleShape2D):}{\loch
 Defines the collision area for physics interactions on the floor. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Marker2D:}{\loch
 Serves as a reference point for positioning doors and other elements on the floor. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Doors:}{\loch
 Instantiated at runtime by }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
floor.gd}{\loch
 using data from }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
DoorData.gd}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Door (Area2D):}
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Purpose:}{\loch
 Represents an individual door on a floor. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Script:}{\loch
 Attached script }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 (extends Area2D). }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl3\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2836\lin2836\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Sprite Scene:}
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls2 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s3\rtlch\af12\afs28\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af5\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb140\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf1\f5\fs28\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af10\langfe2052{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
Explicit Relationships}
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Main Scene}{\loch
 includes }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Building Scene}{\loch
 as a child node. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Building Scene}{\loch
 uses the }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 script to manage building generation. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 extends Node2D and is attached to }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Building Scene}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 instantiates multiple floor instances at runtime using the single }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Floor Scene (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
Floor.tscn}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
)}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Floor instances}{\loch
 receive door data from }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 and handle their own configuration and door instantiation. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Floor nodes}{\loch
 are managed by the }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
floor.gd}{\loch
 script, which extends Area2D. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
floor.gd}{\loch
 handles positioning, collision shape configuration, and marker setup for each floor instance. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Door nodes}{\loch
 are managed by the }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 script, which extends Area2D. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 relies on its child nodes: }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
AnimatedSprite2D}{\loch
 for displaying door animations. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
CollisionShape2D}{\loch
 for interaction detection. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
TooltipBackground (NinePatchRect)}{\loch
 with }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
 attached, which manages tooltip display. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
 is attached to }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
TooltipBackground}{\loch
 and handles all tooltip functionality. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls3 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
DoorData.gd}{\loch
 provides configuration data used by }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 to provide door data to floors, and by }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 to configure individual doors. }
\par \pard\plain \s358\rtlch\af12\afs12\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa283\brdrt\brdrnone\brdrl\brdrnone\brdrb\brdrdb\brdrw15\brdrcf15\brsp0\brdrr\brdrnone\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs12\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052\loch

\par \pard\plain \s2\rtlch\af12\afs36\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af5\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb200\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf1\f5\fs36\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af10\langfe2052{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
2. Script Summaries and Responsibilities}
\par \pard\plain \s3\rtlch\af12\afs28\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af5\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb140\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf1\f5\fs28\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af10\langfe2052{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
High-Level Overviews}
\par \pard\plain \s4\rtlch\af12\afs28\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af5\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb120\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf1\f5\fs28\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af10\langfe2052{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch

\par \pard\plain \s4\rtlch\af12\afs28\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af5\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb120\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf1\f5\fs28\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af10\langfe2052{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch

\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls8 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

 Resource. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls8 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Class Name:}{\loch
 }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch

. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls8 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Purpose:}{\loch
 Provides door configuration data for the building generation process. }

Structure:}{\loch
 }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls8 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418{\loch
Contains an exported array }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
doors}{\loch
, which holds dictionaries with door properties, including tooltip text. }

Iterates through floor numbers (e.g., 0 to 13). }

\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls10 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

(Other functions remain as previously documented.)}
\par \pard\plain \s3\rtlch\af12\afs28\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af5\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb140\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf1\f5\fs28\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af10\langfe2052{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
Explicit Relationships}
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
building.gd}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Attached to }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Building Scene}{\loch
 (Node2D). }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Manages floor instances (Area2D). }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Uses data from }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
DoorData.gd}{\loch
 to provide door data to floor instances. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Floor instances handle their own positioning, collision shape configuration, marker setup, and door instantiation. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
floor.gd}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Attached to floor instances (Area2D). }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Receives }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch

 and }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch

\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Configures floor image, collision shapes, and markers. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Positions itself within the building. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Manages door instantiation and passes }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
door_data}{\loch
 to door nodes. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
door.gd}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Attached to door nodes (Area2D). }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch

Calculates its own position on the floor. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Relies on child nodes: }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

 with }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch

\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch

\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch

\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch

:}
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch

\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Manages tooltip text display and sizing. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Interacts with }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 via exposed methods (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch

\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
DoorData.gd}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
:}
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Provides door configuration data to }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
building.gd}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s354\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af4 \ltrch\hich\af4\loch\f4\dbch\af4 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls12 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418{\loch
Contains properties used by }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 and }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af14 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af11\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
 for individual door setup, including tooltip. }
\par \pard\plain \s358\rtlch\af12\afs12\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa283\brdrt\brdrnone\brdrl\brdrnone\brdrb\brdrdb\brdrw15\brdrcf15\brsp0\brdrr\brdrnone\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs12\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052\loch
