\par \pard\plain \s3\rtlch\af12\afs28\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af7\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb140\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf1\f7\fs28\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af10\langfe2052{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
Integration with Scripts}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
building.gd:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Preloads }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
DoorData.gd}{\loch
 to access door configuration data. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Filters door data for each floor and provides it to floor instances. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
floor.gd:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Receives door data from }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
building.gd}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Instantiates doors and passes }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
door_data}{\loch
 to each door instance. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Adds the floor to the }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
"floors"}{\loch
 group for collision detection. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Sets the collision layer to }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
1}{\loch
 to match the collision mask used in player input detection. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
door.gd:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Receives individual }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
door_data}{\loch
 dictionaries during setup. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Uses }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
door_data}{\loch
 fields to set door properties and passes tooltip text to }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Calculates its position on the floor based on }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
door_data.door_slot}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
tooltip.gd:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Receives tooltip text from }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 via the }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch

 method. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Manages display and sizing of the tooltip based on the text provided. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
player.gd:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Uses }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
PhysicsPointQueryParameters2D}{\loch
 and }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
intersect_point()}{\loch
 to detect if clicks occur within floor collision areas. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Only updates }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
target_position}{\loch
 if a floor area is clicked. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls17 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418{\loch
Uses }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
collision_mask = 1}{\loch
 to match the floors' collision layer. }
\par \pard\plain \s520\rtlch\af12\afs12\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa283\brdrt\brdrnone\brdrl\brdrnone\brdrb\brdrdb\brdrw15\brdrcf15\brsp0\brdrr\brdrnone\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs12\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052\loch

\par \pard\plain \s2\rtlch\af12\afs36\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af7\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb200\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf1\f7\fs36\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af10\langfe2052{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
4. Flow of Execution and Interaction}
\par \pard\plain \s3\rtlch\af12\afs28\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af7\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb140\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf1\f7\fs28\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af10\langfe2052{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
Process Overview}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain  1.\tab}\ilvl0\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Game Start:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
The }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Main Scene}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
Node2D}{\loch
) is loaded as the game's entry point. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Building Scene}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
Node2D}{\loch
) and }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Player}{\loch
 (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
Node2D}{\loch
) are instantiated within the }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Main Scene}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain  2.\tab}\ilvl0\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Building Generation (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
building.gd}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
):}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
The }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 script runs the }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
_ready()}{\loch
 function. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Preloads }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
DoorData.gd}{\loch
 and the floor scene (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
Floor.tscn}{\loch
). }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch

\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain  3.\tab}\ilvl0\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Iterates through floor numbers (e.g., 0 to 13). }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
For each floor: }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Instantiates the floor using }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
instantiate_floor(floor_number)}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Sets }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
floor_number}{\loch
 and }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
floor_image_path}{\loch
 on the floor instance before adding it to the scene tree. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Calls }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
floor_instance.position_floor(previous_floor_top_y_position, is_first_floor)}{\loch
 to position the floor. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Updates }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
previous_floor_top_y_position}{\loch
 for the next floor. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Filters door data for the current floor. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Passes relevant door data to the floor instance via }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
floor_instance.setup_doors(door_data_array)}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain  4.\tab}\ilvl0\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

floor.gd}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
):}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch

\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Actions: }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch

"floors"}{\loch
 group using }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch

. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Sets the collision layer to }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
1}{\loch
 to match the collision mask used in player input detection. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch

. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch

configure_collision_shape()}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch

configure_marker()}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Positions itself within the building using }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
position_floor()}{\loch
 when called from }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
building.gd}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Receives door data from }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
building.gd}{\loch
 and calls }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
setup_doors(door_data_array)}{\loch
 to instantiate and configure doors. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain  5.\tab}\ilvl0\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

floor.gd}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
):}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
For each }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
door_data}{\loch
: }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Instantiates a door node. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch

setup()}{\loch
 on the door node, passing }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
door_data}{\loch
 and }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
floor_instance}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain  6.\tab}\ilvl0\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Door Configuration (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
door.gd}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
):}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Each door node runs the }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 script. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
setup(p_door_data, p_floor_instance)}{\loch
 applies specific settings to the door, including door type. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Calculates and sets its own position on the floor using }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
position_door()}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Passes tooltip text to }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
tooltip_background.set_text(door_data.tooltip)}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Door animations and collision shapes are updated accordingly. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain  7.\tab}\ilvl0\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Tooltip Setup (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
):}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
The }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
 script attached to }{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
TooltipBackground}{\loch
 initializes and sets the tooltip text. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Adjusts the tooltip size and position based on the text content. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain  8.\tab}\ilvl0\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch

\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch

\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl3\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2836\lin2836\sb0\sa0{\loch
The }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
_input(event)}{\loch
 function detects the left mouse button click. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl3\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2836\lin2836\sb0\sa0{\loch

\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl3\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2836\lin2836\sb0\sa0{\loch
Sets }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
collision_mask}{\loch
 to }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
1}{\loch
 to match the floors' collision layer. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl3\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2836\lin2836\sb0\sa0{\loch
Performs an intersection test at the click position. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl3\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2836\lin2836\sb0\sa0{\loch
Checks if any collider is in the }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
"floors"}{\loch
 group. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl3\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2836\lin2836\sb0\sa0{\loch
If a floor is clicked, updates }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
target_position}{\loch

\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl3\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2836\lin2836\sb0\sa0{\loch
Ignores clicks outside floor areas. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Player Movement (}{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch

\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch

_process(delta)}{\loch

\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Door Interaction:}{\loch
 }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
When the player moves the cursor over a door: }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl3\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2836\lin2836\sb0\sa0{\loch

\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl3\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2836\lin2836\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch

 calls }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
tooltip_background.show_tooltip()}{\loch
 to display the tooltip. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
When the cursor leaves the door area: }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl3\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2836\lin2836\sb0\sa0{\loch

 signal is emitted. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl3\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2836\lin2836\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch

\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain  9.\tab}\ilvl0\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Completion:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
The building is fully generated with all floors and doors properly configured. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
The player can move to clicked positions within floor areas. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls18 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418{\loch
Tooltips enhance player interaction by providing additional information. }
\par \pard\plain \s3\rtlch\af12\afs28\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af7\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb140\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf1\f7\fs28\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af10\langfe2052{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\b\loch
Interaction Points}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls19 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Floors:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls19 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Each floor instance handles its own configuration, including positioning, collision shapes, markers, group assignment, and collision layer settings. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls19 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Floors instantiate and manage their own doors. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls19 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Floors are added to the }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
"floors"}{\loch
 group and set their collision layer to }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
1}{\loch
 for player interaction detection. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls19 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Player:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls19 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Only responds to mouse clicks within floor collision areas. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls19 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Moves towards the clicked position at a constant speed. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls19 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch
Uses collision detection to discard clicks outside floor areas. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls19 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Doors:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls19 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Collision Detection:}{\loch
 Doors are }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
Area2D}{\loch
 nodes with }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
CollisionShape2D}{\loch
, enabling interaction detection. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls19 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Tooltip Display:}{\loch
 Tooltips appear when the player's cursor hovers over a door. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls19 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
TooltipBackground (NinePatchRect)}{\loch
 with }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
 attached manages the visual display. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl2\ls19 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li2127\lin2127\sb0\sa0{\loch
Tooltip text is sourced from }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
DoorData.gd}{\loch
 and passed through }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
door.gd}{\loch
 to }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
tooltip.gd}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls19 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
State Management:}{\loch
 Doors can change states (open/closed) using }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
set_door_state()}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls19 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Animations:}{\loch
 Visual feedback provided through }{\loch\cs16\rtlch\af13 \ltrch\hich\af8\loch\f8\dbch\af11\loch
AnimatedSprite2D}{\loch
. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl0\ls19 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li709\lin709{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Potential User Interactions:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls19 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Moving the Player:}{\loch
 Players can click within floor areas to move the character. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls19 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418\sb0\sa0{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Viewing Tooltips:}{\loch
 Players receive additional information about doors when hovering over them. }
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\listtext\pard\plain \rtlch\af6 \ltrch\hich\af6\loch\f6\dbch\af6 \u8226\'95\tab}\ilvl1\ls19 \fi-283\li0\lin0\tx0\fi-283\li1418\lin1418{\loch\cs15\rtlch\ab \ltrch\loch\b\loch
Opening/Closing Doors:}{\loch
 (Implementation pending) Players may interact with doors to change their state. }
\par \pard\plain \s520\rtlch\af12\afs12\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa283\brdrt\brdrnone\brdrl\brdrnone\brdrb\brdrdb\brdrw15\brdrcf15\brsp0\brdrr\brdrnone\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs12\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052\loch

\par \pard\plain \s2\rtlch\af12\afs36\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af7\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb200\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf1\f7\fs36\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af10\langfe2052\sb200\sa120\hich\af5\loch\cf1\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

# Godot 4 \u8211\'96 2D Game Documentation (Updated)}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
---}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
## 1. Structured Scene and Node Hierarchy Documentation}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
### Hierarchical Overview}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Main Scene (Node2D)**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Building Scene (Node2D)**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Attached Script:** `building.gd` (extends `Node2D`)}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Floor Instances** (instantiated at runtime by `building.gd`)}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Floor (Area2D)**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Attached Script:** `floor.gd` (extends `Area2D`)}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **FloorSprite (Sprite2D)**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **CollisionShape2D (RectangleShape2D)**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Marker2D**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Doors** (instantiated at runtime by `floor.gd`)}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Door (Area2D)**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Attached Script:** `door.gd` (extends `Area2D`)}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **AnimatedSprite2D**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **CollisionShape2D**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **TooltipBackground (NinePatchRect)**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Attached Script:** `tooltip.gd` (extends `NinePatchRect`)}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **TooltipLabel (Label)**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Player (Node2D)**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Attached Script:** `player.gd` (extends `Node2D`)}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Sprite2D** (or `AnimatedSprite2D` for animations)}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Sprite Scene**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- *[Purpose to be defined; likely contains additional sprites or UI elements]*}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
### Brief Descriptions}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Main Scene (Node2D):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Purpose:** Serves as the root of the game and the entry point when the game starts.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Contains:** The Building Scene, Player, and possibly other UI or game elements.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Building Scene (Node2D):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Purpose:** Manages the generation of the building's floors.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Script:** Attached script `building.gd` (extends `Node2D`).}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Functionality:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Preloads a single floor scene (`Floor.tscn`) and door data (`DoorData.gd`).}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Generates the building structure by instantiating multiple floor instances.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Provides door data to floor instances for door instantiation.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Floor Scene:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** A single floor scene (`Floor.tscn`) dynamically instantiated multiple times during runtime by `building.gd`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Floor (Area2D):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Purpose:** Represents and configures individual floor instances.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Script:** Attached script `floor.gd` (extends `Area2D`).}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Contains:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **FloorSprite (Sprite2D):** Displays the visual representation of the floor.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **CollisionShape2D (RectangleShape2D):** Defines the collision area for physics interactions on the floor.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Marker2D:** Serves as a reference point for positioning doors and other elements on the floor.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Doors:** Instantiated at runtime by `floor.gd` using data from `DoorData.gd`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Door (Area2D):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Purpose:** Represents an individual door on a floor.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Script:** Attached script `door.gd` (extends `Area2D`).}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Contains:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **AnimatedSprite2D:** Displays door animations.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **CollisionShape2D:** Defines the collision area for interaction detection.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **TooltipBackground (NinePatchRect):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Attached Script:** `tooltip.gd` (extends `NinePatchRect`)}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **TooltipLabel (Label):** Displays tooltip text when interacting with the door.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Player (Node2D):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Purpose:** Represents the player character that moves within floor areas.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Script:** Attached script `player.gd` (extends `Node2D`).}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Contains:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Sprite2D:** Displays the player's sprite (e.g., the Godot logo).}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Sprite Scene:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Purpose:** *[To be defined; likely contains additional sprites or UI elements used in the game.]*}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
### Explicit Relationships}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Main Scene** includes **Building Scene** and **Player** as child nodes.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Building Scene** uses the `building.gd` script to manage building generation.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- `building.gd` extends `Node2D` and is attached to **Building Scene**.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- `building.gd` instantiates multiple floor instances at runtime using the single **Floor Scene** (`Floor.tscn`).}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Floor instances** receive door data from `building.gd` and handle their own configuration and door instantiation.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Floor nodes** are managed by the `floor.gd` script, which extends `Area2D`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Floors are added to the `"floors"` group during initialization.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Floors set their collision layer to `1` to match the collision mask used in player input detection.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- `floor.gd` handles positioning, collision shape configuration, marker setup, and group assignment for each floor instance.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Door nodes** are managed by the `door.gd` script, which extends `Area2D`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- `door.gd` relies on its child nodes:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **AnimatedSprite2D** for displaying door animations.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **CollisionShape2D** for interaction detection.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **TooltipBackground (NinePatchRect)** with `tooltip.gd` attached, which manages tooltip display.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- `tooltip.gd` is attached to **TooltipBackground** and handles all tooltip functionality.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **DoorData.gd** provides configuration data used by `building.gd` to provide door data to floors, and by `door.gd` to configure individual doors.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Player** uses `player.gd` to handle initialization, movement, and positioning within floor areas, ensuring the player remains within the collision bounds of floors.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
---}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
## 2. Script Summaries and Responsibilities}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
### High-Level Overviews}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **building.gd**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Extends:** `Node2D`}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Attached to:** **Building Scene** node}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Purpose:** Manages the procedural generation of the building.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
**Responsibilities:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Preloads the single floor scene (`Floor.tscn`) and door data (`DoorData.gd`).}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Instantiates multiple floor instances within the building.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Provides relevant door data to floor instances for door instantiation.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **floor.gd**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Extends:** `Area2D`}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Attached to:** **Floor** nodes}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Purpose:** Represents and configures individual floor instances.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
**Responsibilities:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Adds the floor instance to the `"floors"` group for collision detection.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Sets the collision layer to `1` to match the collision mask used in player input detection.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Receives `floor_number` and `floor_image_path` from `building.gd`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Sets the floor image based on the provided image path.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Positions itself within the building structure.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Configures collision shapes and markers for the floor.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Manages door instantiation using the door data provided.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Contains methods to set up doors on the floor.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **door.gd**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Extends:** `Area2D`}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Attached to:** **Door** nodes}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Purpose:** Controls the behavior, appearance, positioning, and interaction of individual doors.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
**Responsibilities:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Configures doors based on provided `door_data`, including door type.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Calculates and sets its own position on the floor.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Manages door states (open or closed).}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Updates door animations accordingly.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Sets up collision shapes for interaction detection.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Interacts with `tooltip.gd` to handle tooltip display when the player interacts with the door.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **tooltip.gd**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Extends:** `NinePatchRect`}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Attached to:** **TooltipBackground** nodes}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Purpose:** Manages tooltip display and sizing.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
**Responsibilities:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Handles all aspects of tooltip display, including setting text, showing, hiding, and resizing.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Adjusts tooltip background size to fit the tooltip text.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Positions the tooltip appropriately relative to the door.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **player.gd**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Extends:** `Node2D`}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Attached to:** **Player** node}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Purpose:** Manages player initialization, movement, and positioning within floor areas, ensuring the player remains within the collision bounds of floors.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
