**Responsibilities:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Initial Positioning:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Positions the player on floor 0 at the start of the game, aligning the player's sprite within the floor's collision area.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Movement Handling:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Captures mouse click events and adjusts the target position to keep the player within the bounds of the clicked floor.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Moves the player smoothly towards the adjusted target position.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Considers player sprite dimensions when calculating movement boundaries.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Collision Detection:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Uses physics queries to detect if mouse clicks occur within floor collision areas.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Discards or adjusts clicks that occur outside or near the edges of floor areas to prevent the player from moving beyond floor limits.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Sprite Alignment and Bounds Adjustment:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Ensures the player's sprite is properly aligned with floor collision areas during initialization and movement.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Prevents the player's sprite from overlapping or exceeding the floor edges.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **DoorData.gd**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Extends:** `Resource`}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Class Name:** `DoorData`}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Purpose:** Provides door configuration data for the building generation process.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
**Structure:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Contains an exported array `doors`, which holds dictionaries with door properties, including tooltip text.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
---}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
## 3. Function Descriptions}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
### **building.gd**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **`_ready()`**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Initializes the building generation process when the **Building Scene** is ready.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Actions:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Calls `generate_building()` to start building generation.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **`generate_building()`**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Generates the building structure by instantiating floor instances.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Actions:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Iterates through floor numbers (e.g., 0 to 13).}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Instantiates each floor using `instantiate_floor(floor_number)`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Calls `floor_instance.position_floor()` to position the floor.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Provides door data to each floor instance via `floor_instance.setup_doors(door_data_array)`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **`instantiate_floor(floor_number)`**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Instantiates a floor instance and sets its properties.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Actions:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Instantiates the floor scene (`Floor.tscn`).}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Sets `floor_number` and `floor_image_path` on the floor instance.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Adds the floor instance to the scene tree.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
### **floor.gd**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **`_ready()`**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Initializes the floor when the node is ready.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Actions:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Adds the floor instance to the `"floors"` group using `add_to_group("floors")`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Sets the collision layer to `1` to match the collision mask used in player input detection.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Retrieves the `FloorSprite` node.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Sets the floor image using `set_floor_image(floor_image_path)`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Configures collision shape with `configure_collision_shape()`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Configures marker with `configure_marker()`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **`set_floor_image(image_path)`**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Sets the floor sprite's texture based on the provided image path.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Actions:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Loads the texture from the image path.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Assigns it to the `FloorSprite` node.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **`configure_collision_shape()`**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Configures the collision shape for the floor.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Actions:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Adjusts the collision shape's size and position based on the floor sprite.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Sets the `collision_layer` property to `1` to ensure it matches the player's collision mask.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **`configure_marker()`**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Configures the marker used for positioning doors.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Actions:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Positions the marker at the bottom edge of the floor sprite.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **`position_floor(previous_floor_top_y_position, is_first_floor)`**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Positions the floor instance within the building.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Actions:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Calculates the position based on the floor's height and stacking order.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Sets its own position.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Returns the new `previous_floor_top_y_position` for stacking subsequent floors.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **`setup_doors(door_data_array)`**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Instantiates and sets up doors on the floor.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Actions:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Iterates through the provided `door_data_array`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Instantiates door nodes and calls `setup()` on each with `door_data` and `self`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
### **door.gd**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **`setup(p_door_data, p_floor_instance)`**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Configures and initializes the door based on provided data.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Actions:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Assigns `door_data` and `floor_instance` from parameters.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Sets `door_type` from `door_data`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Calls `set_door_state(DoorState.CLOSED)` to set initial state.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Calls `position_door()` to calculate and set its position.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Updates collision shape with `update_collision_shape()`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Passes the tooltip text to `tooltip_background.set_text(door_data.tooltip)`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Connects mouse signals for displaying the tooltip via `tooltip.gd`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
*(Other functions remain as previously documented.)*}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
### **player.gd**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **`_ready()`**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Initializes the player when the node is ready.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Actions:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Calls `set_initial_position()` to position the player on floor 0.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Initializes `target_position` to the player's current `global_position` after setting the initial position.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **`set_initial_position()`**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Positions the player at the start of the game on floor 0, aligning with the floor's collision area.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Actions:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Retrieves all nodes in the `"floors"` group.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Iterates through the floors to find the floor with `floor_number == 0`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Calls `get_collision_bounds(building_floor)` to get the collision bounds of floor 0.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Calculates the player's sprite dimensions (`sprite_width`, `sprite_height`).}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Sets `global_position` to align the left edge of the player's sprite with the left edge of the floor's collision area and the bottom of the sprite with the top edge of the collision area.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **`get_collision_bounds(building_floor)`**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Retrieves the collision area bounds (edges) of a given floor.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Parameters:** `building_floor` - the floor instance whose collision bounds are being retrieved.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Actions:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Retrieves the floor's global transform.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Accesses the floor's `CollisionShape2D` node and obtains its `RectangleShape2D`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Uses the floor's transform and collision shape to calculate the edges:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Left Edge:** `center.x - collision_extents.x`}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Right Edge:** `center.x + collision_extents.x`}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Top Edge:** `center.y - collision_extents.y`}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Bottom Edge:** `center.y + collision_extents.y`}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Returns a dictionary containing the edges.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **`adjust_click_position(building_floor, click_position)`**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Adjusts the player's target position based on the floor's collision bounds and the player's sprite dimensions to ensure the player remains within the floor area.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Parameters:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- `building_floor` - the floor instance that was clicked.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- `click_position` - the position of the mouse click event.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Actions:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Calls `get_collision_bounds(building_floor)` to retrieve floor edges.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Calculates the player's sprite dimensions.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Adjusts the `x` component of `click_position`:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- If the click is too close to the left edge, sets `adjusted_x` to `edges.left + sprite_width / 2`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- If the click is too close to the right edge, sets `adjusted_x` to `edges.right - sprite_width / 2`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Otherwise, keeps `adjusted_x` as `click_position.x`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Sets the `y` component (`adjusted_y`) to align the bottom of the sprite with the top edge of the collision area (`edges.bottom - sprite_height / 2`).}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Returns a new `Vector2(adjusted_x, adjusted_y)` representing the adjusted target position.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **`_process(delta)`**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Updates the player's position each frame, moving smoothly towards the adjusted target position.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Actions:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Checks if `global_position` is different from `target_position`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Calculates the direction vector towards `target_position`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Moves the player towards `target_position` at a constant speed (`speed`).}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- If the player is close enough to `target_position` (distance less than 1), snaps `global_position` to `target_position`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **`_input(event)`**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Handles mouse click events for player movement.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Actions:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Detects left mouse button click events.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Creates a `PhysicsPointQueryParameters2D` with `collision_mask = 1` to detect clicks on floor areas.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Performs an intersection test at the click position.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Checks for colliders in the `"floors"` group.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- If a floor is clicked:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Uses `adjust_click_position(building_floor, event.position)` to adjust the target position.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Updates `target_position` with the adjusted position.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- If no floor is clicked:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Ignores the click and optionally outputs "outside area" for debugging.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
### **tooltip.gd**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
*(Functions remain as previously documented.)*}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
---}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
## 3. Resource and Data Structures Documentation}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
### Custom Resources}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **DoorData.gd**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Extends:** `Resource`}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Class Name:** `DoorData`}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Purpose:** Stores an array of door data dictionaries for building generation.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
**Structure:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **`doors`**: Exported array containing door data dictionaries.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
### Data Field Definitions}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
Each door in the `doors` array is a dictionary with the following fields:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **`index` (int):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Unique identifier for the door.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **`floor_number` (int):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Specifies the floor where the door is located.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **`door_slot` (int):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Determines the door's position on the floor.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **`door_type` (int):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Indicates the visual style or type of the door.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **`owner` (String):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Name of the owner or entity associated with the door.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **`tooltip` (String):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Description:** Additional information displayed when interacting with the door.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
### Integration with Scripts}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **`building.gd`:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Preloads `DoorData.gd` to access door configuration data.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Filters door data for each floor and provides it to floor instances.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **`floor.gd`:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Receives door data from `building.gd`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Instantiates doors and passes `door_data` to each door instance.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Adds the floor to the `"floors"` group for collision detection.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Sets the collision layer to `1` to match the collision mask used in player input detection.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **`door.gd`:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Receives individual `door_data` dictionaries during setup.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Uses `door_data` fields to set door properties and passes tooltip text to `tooltip.gd`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Calculates its position on the floor based on `door_data.door_slot`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **`tooltip.gd`:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Receives tooltip text from `door.gd` via the `set_text` method.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Manages display and sizing of the tooltip based on the text provided.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **`player.gd`:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Uses `PhysicsPointQueryParameters2D` and `intersect_point()` to detect if clicks occur within floor collision areas.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Only updates `target_position` if a floor area is clicked.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Uses `collision_mask = 1` to match the floors' collision layer.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Adjusts player positioning to stay within floor bounds, considering sprite dimensions.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
---}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
## 4. Flow of Execution and Interaction}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
### Process Overview}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **Game Start:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- The **Main Scene (Node2D)** is loaded as the game's entry point.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Building Scene (Node2D)** and **Player (Node2D)** are instantiated within the **Main Scene**.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- The `player.gd` script runs `_ready()`, positioning the player on floor 0.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **Building Generation (`building.gd`):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- The `building.gd` script runs the `_ready()` function.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Preloads `DoorData.gd` and the floor scene (`Floor.tscn`).}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Calls `generate_building()` to start building creation.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **Floor Instantiation (`building.gd`):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Iterates through floor numbers (e.g., 0 to 13).}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- For each floor:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Instantiates the floor using `instantiate_floor(floor_number)`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Sets `floor_number` and `floor_image_path` on the floor instance before adding it to the scene tree.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Calls `floor_instance.position_floor(previous_floor_top_y_position, is_first_floor)` to position the floor.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Updates `previous_floor_top_y_position` for the next floor.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Filters door data for the current floor.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Passes relevant door data to the floor instance via `floor_instance.setup_doors(door_data_array)`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **Floor Configuration (`floor.gd`):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Each floor instance runs its `_ready()` function upon instantiation.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Actions:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Adds the floor to the `"floors"` group using `add_to_group("floors")`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Sets the collision layer to `1` to match the collision mask used in player input detection.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Sets the floor image using `set_floor_image(floor_image_path)`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Configures collision shapes with `configure_collision_shape()`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Configures markers with `configure_marker()`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Positions itself within the building using `position_floor()` when called from `building.gd`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Receives door data from `building.gd` and calls `setup_doors(door_data_array)` to instantiate and configure doors.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **Door Placement by Floor Instances (`floor.gd`):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- For each `door_data`:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Instantiates a door node.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Calls `setup()` on the door node, passing `door_data` and `floor_instance`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **Door Configuration (`door.gd`):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Each door node runs the `door.gd` script.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- `setup(p_door_data, p_floor_instance)` applies specific settings to the door, including door type.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Calculates and sets its own position on the floor using `position_door()`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Passes tooltip text to `tooltip_background.set_text(door_data.tooltip)`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Door animations and collision shapes are updated accordingly.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **Tooltip Setup (`tooltip.gd`):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- The `tooltip.gd` script attached to **TooltipBackground** initializes and sets the tooltip text.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Adjusts the tooltip size and position based on the text content.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **Player Interaction:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
##### **Player Initialization (`player.gd`):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- On game start, `player.gd` positions the player on floor 0 using `set_initial_position()`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Ensures the player is aligned within the floor's collision area.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Considers the player's sprite dimensions to prevent overlap beyond floor edges.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
##### **Mouse Click Handling (`player.gd`):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- When the player clicks:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- The `_input(event)` function detects the left mouse button click.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Creates a physics query using `PhysicsPointQueryParameters2D`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Sets `collision_mask` to `1` to match the floors' collision layer.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Performs an intersection test at the click position.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Checks if any collider is in the `"floors"` group.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- If a floor is clicked:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Calls `adjust_click_position(building_floor, event.position)` to adjust the target position within floor bounds.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Updates `target_position` with the adjusted position.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- If no floor is clicked:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Ignores the click and optionally prints "outside area" for debugging.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
##### **Player Movement (`player.gd`):**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- The `_process(delta)` function moves the player towards `target_position` at a constant speed.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Considers sprite dimensions to prevent overlapping floor edges.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Ensures smooth movement and alignment within floor bounds.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
#### **Door Interaction:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- When the player moves the cursor over a door:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- The `mouse_entered` signal is emitted.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- `door.gd` calls `tooltip_background.show_tooltip()` to display the tooltip.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- When the cursor leaves the door area:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- The `mouse_exited` signal is emitted.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- `door.gd` calls `tooltip_background.hide_tooltip()` to hide the tooltip.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
### Completion:}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- The building is fully generated with all floors and doors properly configured.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- The player is initially positioned on floor 0 within the collision bounds.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- The player can move to clicked positions within floor areas, staying within bounds.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Tooltips enhance player interaction by providing additional information.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
---}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
## 5. Interaction Points}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
### **Floors:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Configuration:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Each floor instance handles its own configuration, including positioning, collision shapes, markers, group assignment, and collision layer settings.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Door Management:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Floors instantiate and manage their own doors.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Collision Detection:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Floors are added to the `"floors"` group and set their collision layer to `1` for player interaction detection.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
### **Player:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Initial Positioning:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Starts on floor 0, properly aligned within the collision area.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Movement Constraints:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Only responds to mouse clicks within floor collision areas.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Moves towards the clicked position at a constant speed.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Uses collision detection to discard or adjust clicks outside or near floor edges.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Sprite Alignment:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Considers sprite dimensions to prevent the player from moving beyond floor edges.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Ensures proper alignment within floor bounds during movement and positioning.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
### **Doors:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Collision Detection:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Doors are `Area2D` nodes with `CollisionShape2D`, enabling interaction detection.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Tooltip Display:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Tooltips appear when the player's cursor hovers over a door.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **TooltipBackground (NinePatchRect)** with `tooltip.gd` attached manages the visual display.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Tooltip text is sourced from `DoorData.gd` and passed through `door.gd` to `tooltip.gd`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **State Management:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Doors can change states (open/closed) using `set_door_state()`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Animations:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Visual feedback provided through `AnimatedSprite2D`.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
### **Potential User Interactions:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Moving the Player:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Players can click within floor areas to move the character.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- The player will only move within the allowed floor bounds.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Viewing Tooltips:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- Players receive additional information about doors when hovering over them.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Edge Prevention:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- The script prevents the player from moving beyond floor edges, enhancing gameplay and visual consistency.}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- **Opening/Closing Doors:**}
\par \pard\plain \s516\rtlch\af12\afs24\alang1081 \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af3\loch\sl276\slmult1\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb0\sa140\ltrpar\cf1\f3\fs24\lang8192\kerning1\dbch\af11\langfe2052{\loch
- *(Implementation pending)* Players may interact with doors to change their state.}
\par \pard\plain \s1\rtlch\af12\afs48\alang1081\ab \ltrch\lang8192\langfe2052\hich\af7\loch\ql\nowidctlpar\hyphpar0\sb240\sa120\keepn\ltrpar\cf1\f7\fs48\lang8192\b\kerning1\dbch\af10\langfe2052\sl276\slmult1\sb0\sa200\hich\af5\loch\cf1\fs22\lang1031\f5\loch

\par }
